title: Seniors pls advice on how to study for all subjects for esa sem 3
content: My internals are all going to be in the 35-40 range. Web Tech & ddco were very bad and I'm very worried about how I'll do in these esas because i cant even tell if they'll do relative grading also

comments.body: Get off this app and abandon your phone. Here is your answer.
If your internals are in the 35-40 range idts you have anything to worry abt lmao
i m sure ill have less than 35 in ddco and web tech. other subjects maybe a bit higher but not going to be too hopeful

prev papers if you find from sources like the discord you'll have an idea of what qs they'll ask. but yeah in general you need to learn stuff more in depth. problem solving + core theory you need properly. at least that's what I did in college
